text: Well this one is going directly to my Relaxin' playlist. Even if Tim Follin is mainly known for his amazing chiptunes, this is easily one of my favorite sountracks of his. Dolphin's Intrigue is still one my most listened VGMs ever. As for this theme, it's also a masterpiece for me with its pads constantly going up and down to reflect the ocean's waves. And then the final sequence with the chorus coming in at 4:06 just gives that feeling of a holy, paradise underwater world. Get in a relaxing position, close your eyes and play this theme.
author: SupraDarky
